 The attribute flags of the segment.
int p_align
 The alignment the segment should have in memory.

Detailed Description

Defines an entry in the ELF32 program header table.

Each entry corresponds to a segment.

Definition at line 206 of file kernel.h.

Field Documentation

int Elf32_Phdr::p_align

The alignment the segment should have in memory.

This field is currently being ignored.
